Member Function Documentation

Color Bitmap::operator() ( double  x,
double  y 
) const [virtual]

Returns the color matching the coordinates.

Returns the color corresponding to the given coordinates.

If x and y are bigger than the size of the image, the pattern is periodic and will be repeated infinitly

Parameters:
x,y : Coordinates for the texture
